snippet: Several teams have traded their on-ice leaders — four have done so in the last year alone — but they have not always gotten a good return.
abstract: There is uncertainty over the future of New York Rangers’ captain, Ryan Callahan, with fans wondering whether he will be dealt before the trade deadline on March 5 or the Olympic roster freeze on Feb 7; several teams have traded their on-ice leaders, four have done so in the last year alone, but they have not always gotten a good return.
lead_paragraph: Several teams have traded their on-ice leaders — four have done so in the last year alone — but they have not always gotten a good return.

headline.main: Trading Captain Isn’t a Rarity in the N.H.L., and Usually Isn’t a Productive Move
headline.print_headline: Trading Captain Isn’t a Rarity in the N.H.L., and Usually Isn’t a Productive Move
